defaultRecipes.title: Fried Rice
defaultRecipes.description: Cook rice in rice cooker. Add vegetables, soy sauce, and cooked chicken. Stir in scrambled eggs.
defaultRecipes.ingredients: Rice, Vegetables, Soy Sauce, Eggs, Chicken

defaultRecipes.title: Risotto
defaultRecipes.description: Cook onions and mushrooms in rice cooker. Add rice and broth. Cook until creamy. Stir in cheese.
defaultRecipes.ingredients: Arborio Rice, Chicken Broth, Parmesan Cheese, Mushrooms, Onions

defaultRecipes.title: Jambalaya
defaultRecipes.description: Cook sausage and bell peppers in rice cooker. Add rice, tomatoes, shrimp, and seasoning. Cook until done.
defaultRecipes.ingredients: Rice, Sausage, Shrimp, Bell Peppers, Tomatoes, Cajun Seasoning

defaultRecipes.title: Sushi Rice
defaultRecipes.description: Cook sushi rice in rice cooker. Mix vinegar, sugar, and salt. Stir into cooked rice.
defaultRecipes.ingredients: Sushi Rice, Rice Vinegar, Sugar, Salt

defaultRecipes.title: Rice Pudding
defaultRecipes.description: Cook rice in rice cooker with milk and sugar. Stir in cinnamon and raisins.

defaultRecipes.title: Congee
defaultRecipes.description: Cook rice in rice cooker with chicken broth and ginger. Top with green onions and soy sauce.
defaultRecipes.ingredients: Rice, Chicken Broth, Ginger, Green Onions, Soy Sauce

defaultRecipes.title: Quinoa
defaultRecipes.description: Cook quinoa in rice cooker with vegetable broth. Fluff with fork and serve.

defaultRecipes.title: Lentils
defaultRecipes.description: Cook lentils in rice cooker with onions, carrots, and celery. Season with salt and pepper.
defaultRecipes.ingredients: Lentils, Onions, Carrots, Celery, Salt, Pepper

defaultRecipes.title: Chili
defaultRecipes.description: Cook ground beef and onions in rice cooker. Add beans, tomatoes, and chili seasoning. Simmer until done.
defaultRecipes.ingredients: Ground Beef, Onions, Beans, Tomatoes, Chili Seasoning

defaultRecipes.title: Mac and Cheese
defaultRecipes.description: Cook macaroni in rice cooker. Stir in cheese, milk, and butter until creamy.
